title: President approves appointment of Muhammad Ali Latif as SBP’s board director
content:
ISLAMABAD, Dec 29 (APP): President Arif Alvi on Thursday approved the appointment of Muhammad Ali Latif as the non-executive director of the board of State Bank of Pakistan (SBP).
The president gave the approval  under Section 11A of the State Bank of Pakistan Act, 1956.
President Alvi also approved the Registration (Amendment) Bill 2022.
The Bill has amended the Section 17 of the Registration Act, 1908.
The President approved the Bill under Article 75 of the Constitution.
